body: I usually use body shop body butter. The thick base of their body butter ensures mositurization for a long duration. However this time I decided to get this one as it came for a lesser cost. The result is not so satisfying given that I had a benchmark and it did'nt quite live upto that. But to be fair I think this is a good one in this price range. The cream base is supple and moisturizes for about 6 hours. I personally would pay more and get a better product.

Creams more expensive than this one do not even stand in the competition.Worth a try guys. I used several expensive creams for dry body skin and then i got this and now you can see a fan who persistently follows this product.
title: Nothing better than this

body: I got this product because of the high ratings here and also it was on a discount. Even without the discount it is a good purchase considering the amount of product you get.The cream is lightweight in consistency and smells like honey. It comes in a huge round tub that's transparent and made of plastic and has a golden coloured plastic lid. It is sealed with golden coloured foil. I just love the packaging of this product. This is a good lightweight moisturiser and is perfect for using as a hand cream especially for people who run through hand creams very quickly. Definitely recommended if you are looking out to save money on hand creams. It's such a huge amount for a minimum price. It will certainly work well for the body as well.
title: Star product
